#summary A guide what elements make up this plugin and can and must be used from the skin.

= Windows =

The Plugin offers 2 window implementations:
 * Id: 4755 - The main OnlineVideos window where the user can browse sites and play videos.
 * Id: 4757 - A secondary window that allows management and updating of sites.

The Blue3Wide skinfiles that are installed with the plugin are always kept updated and should be used as a reference when creating skinfiles.

The plugin comes with its own localization, so skinners are encourages to use the provided properties for their labels.

The skin for the window 4755 should set allowoverlay to yes, because external players (e.g. WindowsMediaPlayer) will be used in some cases.

= Properties set in the code =
 * Global
  * `#header.label` - changes according to the current site/category, ...
  * `#header.image` - changes according to the current site
  * `#OnlineVideos.Translation.ManageSites.Label` - can be used for the button that calls the site manager window

 * Site Manager Window (4757) only
  * `#OnlineVideos.owner` - Creator of the current selected item (localized label property: {{{#OnlineVideos.Translation.Creator.Label}}})

 * OnlineVideos Window (4755) only
  * `#OnlineVideos.filter` - Current SMS T9 Filter
  * `#OnlineVideos.state` - Current View (values: sites, categories, videos, details)
  * `#OnlineVideos.length` - runtime and airdate (if available) of the current selected item (localized label property: {{{#OnlineVideos.Translation.Runtime.Label}}})

 * Facade
  * `#itemcount` - total number of items
  * `#selecteditem` - title of the current selected item
  * `#selectedthumb` - thumb (if available) for the current selected item
  * `#OnlineVideos.desc` - description (if available) of the current selected item

 * Details View
  * `#OnlineVideos.movieposter` - path to an poster format image
  * `#OnlineVideos.trailerdesc` - (localized label property: {{{#OnlineVideos.Translation.PlotOutline.Label}}})
  * `#OnlineVideos.genre` - (localized label property: {{{#OnlineVideos.Translation.Genre.Label}}})
  * `#OnlineVideos.releasedate` - (localized label property: {{{#OnlineVideos.Translation.DateOfRelease.Label}}})
  * `#OnlineVideos.cast` - (localized label property: {{{#OnlineVideos.Translation.Actors.Label}}})

 * Currently Playing Video
  * `#Play.Current.Title`
  * `#Play.Current.Plot`
  * `#Play.Current.Thumb`
  * `#Play.Current.Genre`
  * `#Play.Current.Year`
  * `#Play.Current.Cast`
